sentences.en: " Did you hear any more from the brewery? "
sentences.cn: “ 你有那家酿酒厂的消息了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Got a job bottle-washing at the brewery. I lasted a fortnight. I couldn't stick it.
sentences.cn: 我找了份在啤酒厂洗瓶子的工作。干了两星期，就再也受不了了。

sentences.en: The beer is brewed at the Charles Wells Brewery.
sentences.cn: 这种啤酒是查尔斯·威尔斯啤酒厂生产的。

sentences.en: The beer is brewed in the time-honoured way at the Castle Eden Brewery.
sentences.cn: 伊登堡酿酒厂以传统酿制方式酿造啤酒。

sentences.en: The brewery had 25 heavy horses delivering beer in London.
sentences.cn: 啤酒厂有25匹高头大马在伦敦城中运送啤酒.

sentences.en: The brewery supplies the beers to local Asda's, Booths and other independents.
sentences.cn: 啤酒厂的啤酒,以供应当地阿斯达的, 摊位及其他独立.

sentences.en: The brewery will remain open to the public throughout its ten-year transformation, so the architects wanted to test how a construction site can be used for public activities.
sentences.cn: 啤酒厂在它转型的十年内都将持续对公众开放，所以建筑师希望测试一个施工基地怎样才能用于公共活动。

sentences.en: The chief financial officer, Adrian Joseph, is another Lion Brewery alumnus.
sentences.cn: 公司首席财务官阿德里安?约瑟夫(AdrianJoseph)是另一位来自雄狮酿酒公司的员工.

sentences.en: The Muller family have been making specialist beers at their brewery in Munster for 200 years.
sentences.cn: 马勒家族已经在他们位于明斯特的啤酒厂专门从事啤酒酿制达200年之久。

sentences.en: The weather has brought such a demand for beer that one brewery will operate over the weekend.
sentences.cn: 天气状况使得对啤酒的需求大增，一家啤酒厂周末要加班了。

sentences.en: They bought all their equipment from a defunct brewery in Manhattan.
sentences.cn: 他们那些设备都是从曼哈顿一家已经关闭的啤酒厂购买的。

sentences.en: Until the nineteenth century, yeasts for bread making were obtained directly from the nearest brewery.
sentences.cn: 直到十九世纪, 面包用酵母都是直接从最近处的啤酒厂取得的.

sentences.en: We had to sell things off to pay the brewery bill.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不变卖东西以偿付啤酒厂的账单。

sentences.en: When business was good, the brewery employed 20 people.
sentences.cn: 在生意好的时候, 这家酿造厂曾经雇佣过20人.

sentences.en: Workers at the Tsingtao Brewery bottle beer for export.
sentences.cn: 青岛啤酒厂的工人在给出口的啤酒装瓶.

sentences.en: Yes, he slipped this time. Nobody can make money from that brewery.
sentences.cn: 对, 他这回失算了. 在那酿酒厂上谁也别想赚钱.

trans.tran_en: a place where beer is made, or a company that makes beer
